channel.title: Training on Yarra Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Training on Yarra Framework

item.title: Workshop at ISMRM 2019
item.description: We will present Yarra in the Weekend Educational Session on Open-Source Software Tools that will take place at the ISMRM 2019 Meeting in Montreal. Roy Wiggins will give an overview talk at 11:00am and give a practical demonstration on how reconstruction algorithms can be integrated into Yarra at 1:30pm, 2:20pm, and 3:10pm. You can find the training material also in the Resources section.  ISMRM Educational Session on Open-Source Software Tools
